Description:
Stunning Contemporary Homestead on over 1/2 an Acre.
Situated in a prime position, on over half an acre of beautiful gardens and walking distance to the centre of Historical Clunes is this immaculate and spacious 4 bedroom brick homestead.
From the timber decked veranda that wraps around 3 sides of the home, you step through the front door to a semi-formal entrance and into the expansive living areas. Polished cypress pine floors to all living areas and wall to wall carpet in all bedrooms, all with Built in robes and ceiling fans, the master with walk through robes and full en suite.
The full country kitchen offers plenty of cupboard space, dishwasher, quality electric appliances, ceramic cook-top and complete with butlers pantry. From there the open plan dining room opens via sliding doors to the expansive covered entertaining area, ideal for family get togethers.
The stunning landscaped rear gardens include a manicured dry creek bed feature, fire pit, peppercorn and silver birch trees and a separate covered BBQ area, with 7-foot hedges bordering the property for that added touch of privacy.
The home includes an attached double garage with high clearance and remote entry along with a separate powered 2 bay shed with additional workshop/potting room with concrete floors.
Topped off with evaporative cooling, split systems and combustion heating, and plenty of space for the caravan, this property is available by private inspection. Please contact the agent to arrange a viewing.
Insights: 38 Canterbury Street, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2019 and 11 other 4 bedroom house in Clunes have recently been sold.

Description:
FEATURE PACKED AND WELL-PRESENTED QUALITY HOME IN CENTRAL CLUNES
Positioned less than 100 metres from the town centre of the highly popular and sought after township of Clunes is the immaculately presented and surprisingly privately located home. This 2 storey home on the ground floor boasts a large main living area with wood fire and split system, a timber kitchen with ample room including a dishwasher, meals area and the main bedroom and bathroom. On the timber lined second level there are 2 more bedrooms, second bathroom and living area with good storage space. There is also a verandah area that lover looks the local surrounds. There is a new 3.3 solar power system working for you placing savings in to your energy bills with the possibility to increase the capacity. Externally on this low maintenance block of approx. 445sqm enjoy the easy care gardens, outdoor entertaining area with new roofing, garden shed and hothouse, double garage and enough room for the family pet to run around all overlooking the park area. This home it truly a rare find so close to town and in such a sought after township. Be first to inquire today.

Description:
Large 3 Acre Residential Allotment on the High Side of Town
This pretty parcel of land is set high and dry and offers wonderful views. The block is in a quiet court with just a few residences to become your neighbors. Measuring 1.33 Hectares the land is over 12,000m2 or just above 3 acres. Build your dream home on this attractive block and have a life of convenience just one minute to the hub of town. Inspect today and start planning that dream home.

Description:
Historic Schoolhouse in Clunes
Be greeted by a magical lush garden entry to this rare 1886 original one-bedroom school house. Features include open plan living, dining, kitchen with gas cooking, modern bathroom, exceptionally high cathedral style ceilings and many original period features throughout. Note: air conditioning, wood fire heater, under cover car port. This is an ideal first home or holiday weekender.
Located centrally in the popular arts & tourism township of Clunes and with easy access to nearby Daylesford & Ballarat.
This special property won’t disappoint.

Description:
Family Entertainer on approx. 3.4 acres with vineyard
Set well back from the road in a quiet location, this fabulous 4 bedroom plus study, quality family home offers the opportunity for complete relaxation. Only 6 years old, this solid Bryan & Petersen build features 2.7m ceiling, polished timber flooring on a concrete slab and well placed bay windows for maximum light and includes 2 living areas. Very effective wood heating or Split System provides cosy winter warmth. Master bedroom has walk-in robe and en-suite with spa bath and separate shower. Kitchen features large breakfast bar, butlers pantry, dishwasher, 900mm oven and cook top. Solar hws with lpg booster
Outdoor entertaining includes a 9x6m undercover deck with access from the huge open plan kitchen/dining/family room. The 2 car garage has direct access. A small dam a nice addition to the view from the deck and approx1/4 acre of Shiraz grape vines. Extra outdoor shedding includes a great man cave or teenagers zone with kitchenette and bathroom, wood heating and split system.
Only 2 minutes drive to the hub of historic Clunes.
Inspection is by appointment only.
For more information please contact: Jo Millar on 0438 081 301 or Angela Flowers on 0437 456 908

Description:
Circa 1867 Shop front with residence in the heart of Historic Clunes
This renovated double story property has maintained its period style, high ceilings with original pressed metal ceiling a feature to bedrooms along with open fire places, while offering a great location for those who are looking to open a small business with residence in one.
Versatile in layout, separate entries to shop & residence with option for direct access if required. Features include: Disabled toilet, claw foot bath, French doors from living area opening onto 2nd story balcony, 3 x open fireplace, living, bedroom, study/office or library all interchangeable. Courtyard has easy access to main street cafes.
Inspection encouraged.
For more information please contact Jo Millar 0438 081 301 or Angela Flowers 0437 456 908

Don't Be Fooled By The Name!
Small acreage lots with a planning permit to build a 4 bedroom home don't come along very often, so be quick to check this one out!
Approximately 1.78 acres of flat land, set high above the town, this allotment has power nearby and comes complete with permits in place to build your dream home. Plenty of room for a huge shed if you want it, or a paddock for a pony. With lots of new building happening around the area, it's sure to go ahead quickly and offers wonderful distant views in all directions.
Call our agent today for an inspection.

This lovely home has practical detail in its built-in wall cavities for display items or family photos with a functional layout for easy living on approximately 2742m2.
Ideal for the modern family with plenty of room for the kids or fur babies to run.
Includes:
4 large bedrooms, master with en-suite & WIR, BIR to bedrooms 2, 3 & 4
Kitchen with plenty of storage, corner pantry, dishwasher, electric oven & lpg cook top
Large sunny dining area, 2 living areas
Wood heating & split system
Large extended timber decking to alfresco area
DLUG remote roller door and access to front door and alfresco area
New planting of shade trees and a blank canvas to create your own oasis
Walking distance to Clunes Primary School and sporting facilities.
A must to inspect!

Description:
Great Family Home on 2 acres
This well maintained home will tick plenty of boxes for those who are looking for a very comfortable tree change. Separate entry to 2nd living area a real bonus, which works well for home office or extended family. Property includes 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 living plus sun/activity room, solar hws, split system & wood heating, 10x6 workshop & dbl carport. A variety of fruit trees & vegetable garden for self sufficiency along with chook shed. Sit on the front veranda and enjoy views over the well established manicured garden with Mount Mt Beckworth as your backdrop. Approx. 1.3kms to the centre of town.
For more information please contact Jo Millar on 0438 081 301 or Angela Flowers on 0437 456 908

Description:
Rustic Country Cottage on 2.48 acres
The perfect tree change is this well maintained country getaway providing warmer Winters and cooler Summers with it's Mud Brick construction and includes solar panels for extra savings. The earthy build a great insulation for the changing seasons. Ideal property for horses or great little farmyard with 2 paddocks fully fenced with solar electric fencing.
Features Include:
Cathedral ceiling, pine lined
Colonial windows, Slate floors
3 Bedrooms - 2 with built in robes
New bathroom
Wood fire heating/reverse cycle air-conditioning
Easy care gardens including mature shade trees, rose garden, fruit trees
Single carport
wood shed, garden shed, chook shed, rabbit hutch, animal shelter
Good fencing, enclosed house garden, easy access to rear paddock
Tree lined driveway
On school bus route

Description:
Great Building Block on 3120m2
In the elevated location of North Clunes you will find this 3120m2 (approx) block waiting for the next owner to create their own idea of country town living.
Includes:
Feature Palm Tree with views of Mount Beckworth & surrounding hills
Walking distance to Primary School and sporting facilities
10 minute walk to shopping precinct
Water meter on block, Power pit at front, Sewer line runs past
Zoned Low Density Residential
Please contact Jo Millar on 0438 081 301 or Angela Flowers on 0437 456 908 for further information

Description:
Privacy with views on 2825m2
Set back on the block for privacy, this lovely 2 bedroom home makes an ideal permanent residence or holiday home to escape the rat race. With extensive established gardens, the property takes advantage of the northern sunshine. A good sized undercover decked area for entertaining at the rear, spa area an added bonus. Veranda on all sides with sunblinds all round, allows you to take in pleasant country views over the well established gardens. The sloping block allows for excellent under house storage. Features include new bamboo flooring throughout the home, exposed beams in living room, lpg log heating & split system as well as ceiling fans. Good supply of shedding includes a huge 4 car powered garage with roller doors to separate half way. Ideal for those in need of a studio or the like and a huge 4 car carport. Situated in a quiet location combined with privacy within walking distance to historic town centre, this one is too good to miss.
Inspection by appointment.
For more information please contact Jo Millar on 0438 081 301 or Angela Flowers on 0437 456 908
